title: How do I connect my phone to a Wi-Fi network?
answer:
1. Go to Settings. Under Wireless & networks, touch Wi-Fi. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109374)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109375)

 1. Turn on Wi-Fi to search for Wi-Fi networks in range. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109376)

 1. If Wi-Fi is turned on, your phone automatically searches for available Wi-Fi networks. Touch the desired network. In the displayed dialog box, enter the password for the Wi-Fi network and touch Connect. After the connection is set up, you will be able to use the Wi-Fi network to access the Internet. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109377)
